mapper.select: SELECT NUM, HOCODE, HOID, HOEMAIL, HODATE, HOUN, CK FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(H.HO_CODE) DESC ) AS NUM, H.HO_CODE AS HOCODE, H.HO_ID AS HOID, HI.HO_EMAIL AS HOEMAIL, TO_CHAR(H.HO_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS HODATE, NVL2(HU.HO_UNCODE,'탈퇴','활동중') AS HOUN, NVL(AP.CK, 0) AS CK FROM HOST H JOIN HOST_INFO HI ON H.HO_CODE = HI.HO_CODE LEFT JOIN HOST_UNREG HU ON H.HO_CODE = HU.HO_CODE LEFT JOIN (SELECT HO_CODE, COUNT(AD_PERDATE) AS CK FROM STUDYCAFE WHERE AD_PERDATE IS NOT NULL GROUP BY HO_CODE) AP ON H.HO_CODE = AP.HO_CODE ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(H.HO_CODE) DESC ) WHERE NUM BETWEEN 1+((#{VNUM}-1)*10) AND (#{VNUM}*10)
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM HOST

SELECT H.HO_CODE AS HOCODE, H.HO_ID AS HOID, HI.HO_EMAIL AS HOEMAIL, TO_CHAR(H.HO_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS HODATE, HI.HO_NAME AS HONAME, HI.HO_TEL AS HOTEL, SUBSTR(HI.HO_SSN,1,6)||'-'||SUBSTR(HI.HO_SSN,7,1)||'******' AS HOSSN, HI.HO_EMAIL AS HOEMAIL , TO_CHAR(HU.HO_UNDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS HOUNDATE, HU.REASON_CODE AS REASONCODE, CK FROM HOST H JOIN HOST_INFO HI ON H.HO_CODE = HI.HO_CODE LEFT JOIN HOST_UNREG HU ON H.HO_CODE = HU.HO_CODE LEFT JOIN (SELECT HO_CODE, COUNT(AD_PERDATE) AS CK FROM STUDYCAFE WHERE AD_PERDATE IS NOT NULL GROUP BY HO_CODE) AP ON H.HO_CODE = AP.HO_CODE WHERE H.HO_CODE = #{HOCODE}
